summary: Website for a YouTube channel focused on Rubik's Cube content - stylish, modern, and interactive design, featuring cubing memes and relatable moments
architectural_notes: Website project for YouTube channel content
Focus on Rubik's Cube related content theme
Emphasis on modern, stylish design with interactive elements
Channel content includes cubing memes and relatable moments

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays YouTube channel content related to Rubik's Cubes, including video thumbnails, titles, and descriptions
Implement interactive UI elements such as hover effects on video cards, smooth transitions, and clickable elements that provide visual feedback
Design and implement a modern, stylish visual theme that reflects Rubik's Cube aesthetics with bold colors, clean typography, and contemporary layout patterns
Create a video player section that allows users to watch selected YouTube videos directly on the website
Update the channel branding in the header to display 'InfiniteSolvesCubes' as the channel name
Update the hero section to reference 'InfiniteSolvesCubes' channel in the headline and description text
Update the footer branding to display 'InfiniteSolvesCubes' as the channel name
Update the HTML document title to 'InfiniteSolvesCubes - Rubik's Cube Channel'
Update the Hero component description text to mention that the channel features cubing memes and relatable moments in addition to tutorials and content

new_feature_requests.summary: Create stylish and modern website design
Add cubing memes and relatable moments to channel description
